item.title: Deploying Betelgeuse App using Octopus
item.description: This guide explains you how to manually deploy to the AWS Cloud any of the following Betelgeuse projects using Octopus deploy: Orion.Client Orion.Bellatrix Orion.Rigel Orion.Saiph Note: These projects are automatically deployed to the development and testing environments. Both environments share the same projects and versions. For the laboratory environment, some of these packages are deployed manually. The deployment process of Betelgeuse projects is detailed in the Architecture Guide.
